name: tabs
docstring: Set of content sections to be displayed one at a time.

TabsRoot.name: TabsRoot
TabsRoot.docstring: Set of content sections to be displayed one at a time.

properties.name: default_value
properties.docstring: The value of the tab that should be active when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the tabs.

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The controlled value of the tab that should be active. Use when you need to control the state of the tabs.

properties.name: activation_mode
properties.docstring: The mode of activation for the tabs. "automatic" will activate the tab when focused. "manual" will activate the tab when clicked.

events.name: on_change
events.docstring: Fired when the value of the tabs changes.

TabsList.name: TabsList
TabsList.docstring: Contains the triggers that sit alongside the active content.

properties.name: loop
properties.docstring: When true, the tabs will loop when reaching the end.

TabsTrigger.name: TabsTrigger
TabsTrigger.docstring: The button that activates its associated content.

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The value of the tab. Must be unique for each tab.

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.docstring: The color of the line under the tab when active.

TabsContent.name: TabsContent
TabsContent.docstring: Contains the content associated with each trigger.

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The value of the tab. Must be unique for each tab.

properties.name: force_mount
properties.docstring: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.
